full_summary:
### **Tender Announcement for Temporary Help Services in the National Capital Region**

**Reference Number**: cb-614-66148783
**Publication Date**: May 8, 2024
**Tender Closing Date**: May 15, 2024, 1:00 PM EST
**Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defense

The Department of National Defense (DND) invites qualified supply arrangement holders to submit a proposal for Temporary Help Services for a period of [insert duration]. This requirement is open only to those supply arrangement holders under EN578-172870 who qualified under the following streams and categories:

#### **Category**: Computer Services Categories - Computer Application Support

The following supply arrangement holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

- 1019837 Ontario Inc.
- ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
- BDO Canada LLP
- Eagle Professional Resources Inc.
- Gomes Consulting Enterprises Ltd.
- inRound Innovations Incorporated
- MaxSys Staffing & Consulting Inc.
- MONZ CONSULTING INC. and NEWFOUND RECRUITING CORPORATION in Joint Venture
- T.I.7 Inc.
- TECH4SOFT INC. and Expertise Technology Consulting Inc. in Joint Venture
- Thinkpoint Inc.

The requirement is for Temporary Help Services, which includes computer application support. The objective is to secure a supply arrangement holder who can provide skilled professionals to support the DND's computer application needs.

**Key Requirements**:

* Temporary Help Services for a period of [insert duration]
* Computer application support services
* Skilled professionals with expertise in computer application support

### **Submission Guidelines**

Qualified supply arrangement holders are encouraged to submit their proposals in electronic format to the following contact information:

* Contact Name: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca

Note: All proposals must be submitted electronically by May 15, 2024, 1:00 PM EST. Please ensure that your proposal is received by the deadline to be considered for this requirement.

**Disclaimer:** This tender announcement is subject to change without notice. It is the responsibility of the bidder to ensure they are aware of any changes or updates. [End of Disclaimer]

**Attachments**:

* [View the full tender notice and request for proposal](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37821/s4949198---method-1-right-fit---rfp
